wp:comment.wp:comment_content: With the new branding, can you please remove the word “dropbox” from (at least) the URL used to upload files? A certain other company has attracted the ire of some corporate IT departments, who simply create a rule to block all URLs containing “dropbox”.

With the new branding, can you please remove the word “dropbox” from (at least) the URL used to upload files? A certain other company has attracted the ire of some corporate IT departments, who simply create a rule to block all URLs containing “dropbox”.
A certain other company has attracted the ire of some corporate IT departments, who simply create a rule to block all URLs containing uRL used to upload files.
Congrats on your new brand refresh. Looks awesome. Well done!
